rukus.text: 94|1|tae yeung minban baekchamh troung robsa anak( mou ham meat) aoy anak
94|2|ning ban dk bantouk robsa anak chenhpi anak
94|3|del ban phtok yeang thngon now leu khnang robsa anak
94|4|haey yeung ban leuk ke tde neam robsa anak aoy khpangkhpasa te ryy
94|5|haey pitabrakd nasa  cheamuoynung sechakdei lombak vetnea  ku pheap ngeayosruol .
94|6|pitabrakd nasa  cheamuoynung se ch kei  d lombak vetnea ku pheap  ngeayosruol .
94|7|dau che  neah  nowpel del anak ban bampenhphearkechch(kechchakar  lokey) ruochreal haey  chaur anak khetkham korp sakkar champoh yeung .
94|8|haey tow champoh mcheasa robsa anak temuoyokt  chaur anak bng  brathnea ning sangkhum .
